name: EXPERIMENT 11022
description:
Brief

EXPERIMENT 11022 - You are an unfortunate soul trapped in a labratory by mad scientists. They have strapped some kind of Technology to your suit. Can you Escape the Lab before you Implode or are hunted by the Secuirty forces?

Premise: Your Experimental Teleporter must be activated every 10 seconds otherwise it will Explode

Objective

Follow the indicator on your HUD to the various consoles and press Space Bar to interact with them. Once you have activated all the consoles the final room will open and you can proceed to escape the facility.

There are some hidden areas with bonus consoles which will allow Allies to be spawned and follow you around the Facility, helping you out to Escape.

Controls

W,A,S,D to move

Q and E to rotate camera

F to melee

Left Click to shoot

Space to pickup weapons, ammo, health and activate consoles

Right Click to teleport

R to reload

1,2,3 to switch weapons

Character will Aim at your cursor.

Game is made using Unreal Engine. If you require the pre-reqs it is under:
ExtractLocation\Engine\Extras\Redist\en-us\UE5PrereqSetup_x64.exe
